body_html:
Ah, you're right. Pinning the embedding matrix to the CPU still resulted in the same error, however. I also had to put the nce weights onto the CPU, but I don't see why this would be the case. Any ideas?

The updated code now works on a GPU machine, this is the device placement: https://gist.github.com/dennybritz/9df7dd2553b0aa8db808

body:
Ah, you're right. Pinning the embedding matrix to the CPU still resulted in the same error, however. I also had to put the nce weights onto the CPU, but I don't see why this would be the case. Any ideas?

The updated code now works on a GPU machine, this is the device placement: https://gist.github.com/dennybritz/9df7dd2553b0aa8db808
